comments.author: jonozzz@yahoo.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: 

Unlike the UI json interface, the WebService for TestCaseRun doesn't have a "delete" method, so there's no way to remove TestCaseRuns programatically.

Reproducible: Always
